product_name: Mountain House Scrambled Eggs with Ham and Green Peppers - Single Serving
long_description: A delicious and nutritious way to start your day-a mix of eggs, ham, green and red bell peppers, and western spices. Mix with water in its own package, stir well, let sit and eat straight from the bag. A quick and easy breakfast to give you energy for camping or backpacking. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: A delicious and nutritious way to start your day-a mix of eggs, ham, green and red bell peppers, and western spices.
